name: GAMA
intro: GAMA is the next generation NFT project
introduce: GAMA is the next generation NFT project  that is sending 10k crew members into space to complete energy harnessing missions across the universe. Owning a GAMA NFT provides an exclusive membership to the GAMA Space Station Metaverse, an unprecedented virtual experience consisting of innovative social interactions, new forms of entertainment, and decentralized gaming mechanics. Other perks include staking opportunities, tickets to GAMA Studios, limited edition merch, and live events.
